Articles.Content:
Well everyone,

need some advice, I'm working on some bits for Amankd and I'd like to add more engines to the part. The part basically is an all in one part which has engines, IVA etc. My wish is to add some "emergency boosters", just hit an action key and you can accelerate much faster thanks to extra engines. I have already put down thrustTransforms to support this on the model, my problem is that the extra engines I've added don't show up in the actions group and hence, I can't even turn them on (they don't come on during staging either for some reason). Any help at all would be appreciated.

Many thanks for the time!
